cacheDisabled.description: Whether the cache should be disabled. Can be overwritten with the environment variable YSC_DISABLED.

cacheReadDisabled.description: Whether reading from the cache should be disabled. Can be overwritten with the environment variable YSC_READ_DISABLED.

cacheWriteDisabled.description: Whether writing to the cache should be disabled. Can be overwritten with the environment variable YSC_WRITE_DISABLED.

additionalProperties.description: Configuration options for one specific cache implementation.

scriptsToCache.description: Defines which scripts should be cached.

items.description: Defines the name of a script that should be cached and the files that are relevant for that script.

scriptName.description: The name of the script to cache, as defined in the package.jsons "scripts"-field.

inputIncludes.description: One or multiple globs defining which files should be included in the "input" files used to check whether two runs are the same. The globs are matched against paths relative to the current working directory.

inputExcludes.description: One or multiple globs defining exceptions from the previous option. The globs are matched against paths relative to the current working directory.

outputIncludes.description: One or multiple globs defining which files should be copied into the cache to be restored on consecutive script executions. The globs are matched against paths relative to the current working directory.

outputExcludes.description: One or multiple globs defining exceptions from the previous option. The globs are matched against paths relative to the current working directory.

environmentVariableIncludes.description: One or multiple regular expressions to match against environment variable names that should be checked for changes on consecutive script executions.

clearBeforeRestore.description: One or multiple directory paths to recursively clear before restoring a cache result. Ensures that no previously existing files remain in the directory a cache result is being restored in.

workspaceDependencyConfig.description: Configures whether workspaces the current workspace is depending on are considered when caching.

additionalProperties.description: Configures whether a specific workspace the current workspace is depending on is considered when caching.
